actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority represented by the failure of the President to apportion certain funds to the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves the deferral of budget authority represented by the failure of the President to apportion specified funds to the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare as set forth in the communication of the Comptroller General (H. Doc. 94-33).

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority represented by the failure of the President to apportion certain funds to the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare.
